abstract: New York State Chief Judge Jonathan Lippman announces new rules that will subject all lawyers in state to uniform disciplinary process; rules are outgrowth of months of negotiations and standardization of system that hat long been hobbled by regional differences.
lead_paragraph: New rules will make lawyers subject to a uniform disciplinary process, putting an end to regional differences in the handling of complaints.

headline.main: New York State Standardizes Its Oversight of Lawyers
headline.print_headline: New Rules for Oversight of Lawyers

snippet: New rules will make lawyers subject to a uniform disciplinary process, putting an end to regional differences in the handling of complaints.
